page.title: 10Inverallochy Castle
page.content: If your name is{Fraser}don't go near {Inverallochy}Castle! To find out why read on.The{Pictish Mormaars}of{Buchan {built Inverallochy}Castle.They also owned{Pitsligo,Pitullie}and{Cairnbulg {castles.The castle was}destroyed by Edward Bruce in{1208}who took it from the{Comyns}and changed that name to Buchan.It was originally built as a fortified house which was meant to protect against raids from local enemies.It was probably after{1400 {that the castle was acquired}by the Fraser family who bought the village of{Inverallochy}in{1600}from their cousins the{Frasers}of{Cairnbulg.} {Charles Fraser}fought with the{Roman {Catholic}army.The{Red Coats}who were based in{Fraserburgh}for{forty years, blew up the castle.There is a story that it will fall and{kill}a father & son of the{Fraser line. Beware!
